definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Serve with stir-fried asparagus and mushrooms as side dish. Ketchup or chili sauce as dipping sauce.
sentences.chinese: 蘆筍和白菇，並附番茄醬或辣醬油沾食豬排。

sentences.english: Then dip it in spicy sauce and let it soak up like a sponge.
sentences.chinese: 然後蘸辣醬油，並讓它像海綿一樣吸收了。
